translated: But among humans, there is also that which is included in non-restraint.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs pa yang yod do //
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni sdom pa ma yin pa ma gtogs pa yang yod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù indicates that there is also that which is not included in non-restraint.

original: mgo dang rked pa bcad na 'chi'o zhes bya ba 'dis ni lhas kyang lha gsod do zhes bstan to //
analyzed: mgo dang rked pa bcad na 'chi'o zhes bya ba 'dis ni lhas kyang lha gsod do zhes bstan to //
translated: This is taught by the statement, ‚ÄúWhen the head and the waist are cut off, one dies.‚Äù

original: ldan pa'i sgo nas yod do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ldan pa'i sgo nas yod do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They exist in terms of possession.

original: gzugs med pa'i dag ni gzugs med pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i dag ni gzugs med pa'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas med do //
translated: In the formless realm, they do not exist in terms of manifestation because there is no form.

original: 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams la ni bsam gtan du skyes pa yin yang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas yod pa ma yin te /üîΩbsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang / de dag gi sems rim 'gags @77a * //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams la ni bsam gtan du skyes pa yin yang bsam gtan gyi sdom pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sgo nas yod pa ma yin te / bsam gtan gyi sdom pa ni sems kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir dang / de dag gi sems rim 'gags @77a * //
translated: In the case of beings devoid of ideation, they do not exist in terms of manifestation of the restraint of absorption, even though they are born in the absorptions.

original: pha'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pha'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the restraint of absorption is associated with thought, and because the thought of those beings is interrupted in a series.

original: gal te gzugs med pa dag na gzugs bas mngon du med na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs med pa dag na gzugs bas mngon du med na /
translated: If form does not manifest in the formless realm,

original: des na 'o na ni gzugs med par skyes pa gang dag cig la ldan pa brjod dgos so zhe na /
analyzed: des na 'o na ni gzugs med par skyes pa gang dag cig la ldan pa brjod dgos so zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is necessary to state that those who are born in the formless realm possess it.

original: de'i phyir gzugs med par skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs med par skyes pa'i 'phags pa rnams la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúNoble beings who are born in the formless realm possess past and future nonindicative virtue.‚Äù

original: 'phags pas sa gang la brten pa can gyi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'phags pas sa gang la brten pa can gyi zhes bya ba la /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is based on any level‚Äù means:

original: sa gang du skyes pas zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims gang bskyed pa de ni /
analyzed: sa gang du skyes pas zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims gang bskyed pa de ni /
translated: The uncontaminated virtue that is generated by one who is born on any level

original: sa de la brten pa can yin no //
analyzed: sa de la brten pa can yin no //
translated: is based on that level.

original: skye ba'i sa lnga rnams te 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhi'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i sa lnga rnams te 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan bzhi'o //
translated: The five levels of birth are the desire realm and the four absorptions.

original: gal te sa gcig la brten pa can skyed de 'gags pa nas /üîΩde bzhin du sa lnga la brten pa can gyi bar bskyed de 'gags na ni gzugs med pa dag na 'das pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te sa gcig la brten pa can skyed de 'gags pa nas / de bzhin du sa lnga la brten pa can gyi bar bskyed de 'gags na ni gzugs med pa dag na 'das pa de dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one generates and seizes the virtue that is based on one level,üîΩthen one possesses past nonindicative virtue in the formless realm.

original: sa lnga char la brten can dang ni ma 'ongs pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa lnga char la brten can dang ni ma 'ongs pa dang ldan no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: If one generates and seizes the virtue that is based on the five levels, then one possesses future nonindicative virtue.

original: gang du skyes pa'am gang du ma skyes pa de dag la brten pa can dang ldan no //
analyzed: gang du skyes pa'am gang du ma skyes pa de dag la brten pa can dang ldan no //
translated: They are possessed in dependence on the stage where one is born or not born.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why? Because there is no certainty.

original: 'di ltar gang ma 'ongs pa rnams grangs kyis sa lnga char la brten nas skye ba srid pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang ma 'ongs pa rnams grangs kyis sa lnga char la brten nas skye ba srid pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not possible that future states of meditative attainment arise in dependence on all five stages, because they are not definitely possessed in dependence on the stage where one is born.

original: de'i phyir gang du skye ba de 'gags pa de ni skyes pa zin pa'i phyir sa kho na bskyed la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang du skye ba de 'gags pa de ni skyes pa zin pa'i phyir sa kho na bskyed la /
translated: Therefore, the stage where one is born is generated in dependence on the stage where one is born, because it is already born.

original: gang ma skyes pa de ni nges pa med pa'i phyir sa lnga char la rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: gang ma skyes pa de ni nges pa med pa'i phyir sa lnga char la rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The stage where one is not born is established in dependence on all five stages, because there is no certainty.

original: so so skye pho 'am 'phags pa gzugs med par skyes pa ni bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ga la ldan to /
analyzed: so so skye pho 'am 'phags pa gzugs med par skyes pa ni bsam gtan gyi sdom pa dang ga la ldan to /
translated: How can ordinary beings and ƒÅryas born in the formless realm possess the restraint of absorption?

original: gzugs med par skyes pas de dor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med par skyes pas de dor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they relinquish it when they are born in the formless realm.

original: lhag byas na zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lhag byas na zhes bya ba la /
translated: If they possess it, they possess the remainder.

original: ga las lhag mar byas she na /
analyzed: ga las lhag mar byas she na /
translated: From what is the remainder?

original: gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang gnyis las so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang gnyis las so //
translated: From two: the formless realm and the beings devoid of discernment.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su ldan pa nges par bshad pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su ldan pa dang mngon du gyur pa nges par brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su ldan pa nges par bshad pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su ldan pa dang mngon du gyur pa nges par brjod par bya'o //
translated: The possession of the formless realm has been explained. The possession and actual manifestation of the desire realm and form realm should be explained.

original: de'i phyir khams su zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir khams su zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, in the realms, etc.

original: dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dmyal ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Except for the hells and Uttarakuru, etc.

original: de na yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de na yang dag par blangs pa'i tshul khrims med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no morality that is assumed there.üîΩIn the other realms, both exist.

original: gzhan @77b na ni gnyi ga yod do zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ma gtogs pa'i mi dag gi nang na ni /
analyzed: gzhan @77b na ni gnyi ga yod do zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dag dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ma gtogs pa'i mi dag gi nang na ni /
translated: In the desire realm, among the gods and humans except for the gods of the desire realm and humans of Uttarakuru,

original: sdom pas bsdus pa dang sdom pa ma gtogs pa yod do //
analyzed: sdom pas bsdus pa dang sdom pa ma gtogs pa yod do //
translated: both the possession of morality that is included in the vows and that which is not included in the vows exist.

original: tshig kyal pa ni tshig gzung bar mi 'os par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni tshig mi brtsun pa'o //
analyzed: tshig kyal pa ni tshig gzung bar mi 'os par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni tshig mi brtsun pa'o //
translated: Frivolous speech is speech that is not accepted.

original: de la ni gti mug shas che ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la ni gti mug shas che ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There, because delusion is predominant, etc.

original: 'di shin tu rmongs pa yang dag blangs par brjod par bya'o zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
analyzed: 'di shin tu rmongs pa yang dag blangs par brjod par bya'o zhes slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //
translated: This is a kind of delusion that is taken up, and is called ‚Äúextreme delusion‚Äù by the master Samghabhadra.

original: rang dbang ma yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rmongs pa ni log par lta ba nyid de /
analyzed: rang dbang ma yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rmongs pa ni log par lta ba nyid de /
translated: Delusion associated with it is called ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù because it is not independent.

original: de'i tshogs su gyur pa yang dag par blangs pas rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i tshogs su gyur pa yang dag par blangs pas rmongs pa'o //
translated: It is delusion that is taken up as a collection of that delusion.

original: brnab sems dang gnod sems dag der gyur pas rmongs pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: brnab sems dang gnod sems dag der gyur pas rmongs pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Covetousness and malice are called ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù because they are included in that delusion.

original: log par lta ba'i sgo nas ma yin no //
analyzed: log par lta ba'i sgo nas ma yin no //
translated: They are not called ‚Äúdelusion‚Äù because of wrong views.

original: 'di ltar gti mug gi stobs kyis med pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa log par lta ba shas che ba 'di ni rmongs pa'o zhes so ;
analyzed: 'di ltar gti mug gi stobs kyis med pa'i rnam pas 'jug pa log par lta ba shas che ba 'di ni rmongs pa'o zhes so ;
translated: Thus, delusion is the predominance of wrong views, which operate through the mode of non-existence by the power of delusion.

original: / de'i gzhi mi mthong ba'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: / de'i gzhi mi mthong ba'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: It is said that the basis of that is not seen.

original: 'di ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: This is the result that is natural outflow of that.

original: 'di rgyu mthun pa'i sgras ba shad pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: 'di rgyu mthun pa'i sgras ba shad pa ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is natural outflow explained by the word ‚Äúresult‚Äù?

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na nye ba nyid du shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu kho na nye ba nyid du shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the dominant result is known to be proximate.

original: gnyis ka bdag po'i 'bras bu zhes brjod par bya ba la de dag nye ba dang ring ba nyid du nye bar ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka bdag po'i 'bras bu zhes brjod par bya ba la de dag nye ba dang ring ba nyid du nye bar ma bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Both should be called dominant results, but they are not taught to be dominant results because they are distant.

original: cig shos lung ma bstan pa'i mi dge ba bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i rgyu mthun par brjod par na ji ltar skyon can du mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: cig shos lung ma bstan pa'i mi dge ba bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i rgyu mthun par brjod par na ji ltar skyon can du mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the other is the natural outflow of the neutral karma to be abandoned by the path of meditation, how could it not be faulty?

original: de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said in detail: Killing is the cause that interrupts life in this life.

original: dug dang gnam lcags dang mtshon cha lhag pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni srog gcod pa rnams kyi tshe dge ba'i las kyis 'phangs pa 'byung ba la gegs byed par nus pa yin te gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dug dang gnam lcags dang mtshon cha lhag pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni srog gcod pa rnams kyi tshe dge ba'i las kyis 'phangs pa 'byung ba la gegs byed par nus pa yin te gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: Whatever poisons, lightning, weapons, and so on there are, they are the cause that interrupts the arising of life projected by virtuous karma of those who kill, but not otherwise.

original: de'i phyir bar chad byed pa'i rgyu ni 'gro ba'i tshe la gegs skyed par nus pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bar chad byed pa'i rgyu ni 'gro ba'i tshe la gegs skyed par nus pa yin no //
translated: Therefore the cause that interrupts is able to generate an obstacle to life.

original: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan du ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir srog gcod pa ni tshe de'i bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin no zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, killing is the cause that interrupts the life of the present existence.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: tshe de srog gcod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhes mi brjod kyi /üîΩde ni ches nye bar bdag po'i @78a * //
analyzed: tshe de srog gcod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu zhes mi brjod kyi / de ni ches nye bar bdag po'i @78a * //
translated: The life of the present existence is not the ripened effect of killing.

original: 'bras bu'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu'o zhes zer ro //
translated: It is the effect of dominance that is most closely related to killing.

original: mi rnams kyi tshe ni dge ba'i las kyis 'phangs pa ste /
analyzed: mi rnams kyi tshe ni dge ba'i las kyis 'phangs pa ste /
translated: The life of humans is projected by wholesome action.

original: srog gcod pa'i dbang gis ni tshe zad pa mngon par 'grub pa byed do //
analyzed: srog gcod pa'i dbang gis ni tshe zad pa mngon par 'grub pa byed do //
translated: Killing causes the life that has been projected to be exhausted.

original: gzi mthu chung ba ni nus pa chung ba'o //
analyzed: gzi mthu chung ba ni nus pa chung ba'o //
translated: Little strength means little power.üîΩHail means a rain of stones.

original: ser ba ni rdo char dang gzhan dag na re 'khyags pa'i char ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: ser ba ni rdo char dang gzhan dag na re 'khyags pa'i char ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: a rain of ice.

original: rdul ni 'gyur byed kyi chu'i char ro //
analyzed: rdul ni 'gyur byed kyi chu'i char ro //
translated: Dust means a rain of water that causes transformation.üîΩOthers say: a rain of dust.

original: gzhan dag na re rdul gyi char te des lo tog brlag par byed pa'o zhes zer ro //üîΩrdul gyis 'khrigs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re rdul gyi char te des lo tog brlag par byed pa'o zhes zer ro // rdul gyis 'khrigs par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It destroys the crops.üîΩThe world is filled with dust.üîΩA dust storm arises.

original: rdul lhags spu ngan par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdul lhags spu ngan par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The hair is bad.

original: sa tshva sgo can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sa tshva sgo can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The ‚Äúland with salty soil‚Äù is

original: 'bru dag mi skye ba'i sa'o //
analyzed: 'bru dag mi skye ba'i sa'o //
translated: the land where crops do not grow.

original: dgon dung ni chu med pa ste mya ngam lta bu'o //
analyzed: dgon dung ni chu med pa ste mya ngam lta bu'o //
translated: ‚ÄúDesert‚Äù is a place without water, like a wilderness.

original: tha chad ni dman zhing smad pa ste /
analyzed: tha chad ni dman zhing smad pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúInferior‚Äù means low and despised,

original: kla klo la sogs pa'i sa dag go //
analyzed: kla klo la sogs pa'i sa dag go //
translated: such as the lands of the barbarians.

original: sdig pa can gyi sa ni ri dags dang phag gis nye bar gces pa'i zhing dag go //
analyzed: sdig pa can gyi sa ni ri dags dang phag gis nye bar gces pa'i zhing dag go //
translated: ‚ÄúSinful‚Äù is a land where the fields are tilled by deer and pigs.

original: dus log pa can ni 'di dag la dus log pa yod pa ste /
analyzed: dus log pa can ni 'di dag la dus log pa yod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúErroneous time‚Äù is a place where the seasons are erroneous,

original: dus bzhin du grang ba dang dro ba dang char 'bab par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩ'bras bu phra mo ni 'bras bu ma rigs pa'o //
analyzed: dus bzhin du grang ba dang dro ba dang char 'bab par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to // 'bras bu phra mo ni 'bras bu ma rigs pa'o //
translated: meaning that it is not cold, warm, or rainy at the appropriate times.üîΩ‚ÄúInferior fruit‚Äù means fruit that is not of good quality.

original: 'bras bu kha ba zhes bya ba ni smin pa mi snyoms zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'bras bu kha ba zhes bya ba ni smin pa mi snyoms zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúBitter fruit‚Äù means fruit that is not ripe evenly.

original: ci las de kho nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ci las de kho nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: From just that karma?

original: gang gis dmyal ba dag tu skyes pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis dmyal ba dag tu skyes pa'o //
translated: That by which one is born in the hells.

original: der ni sbyor bas yin la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: der ni sbyor bas yin la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There, it is by preparation.

original: sbyor ba rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir dang / sdug bsngal drag po rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba rgyun chags pa yin pa'i phyir dang / sdug bsngal drag po rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the preparation is continuous and because it is the cause of intense suffering.

original: dngos ni skad cig ma gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / tshor ba chung ba'i phyir 'dir dngos kyis tshe thung ba yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: dngos ni skad cig ma gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / tshor ba chung ba'i phyir 'dir dngos kyis tshe thung ba yin no zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: The actual basis is not the cause of a short life because it is a single moment and because it produces little feeling.

original: gal te sbyor bas dmyal ba dag tu skye na /
analyzed: gal te sbyor bas dmyal ba dag tu skye na /
translated: If one is born in hell through preparation,üîΩthen how is it that a sutra declares:

original: 'o na mdo las srog gcod pa kun tu bsten pa dang / goms par byas pa dang / lan mang du byas pas dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
analyzed: 'o na mdo las srog gcod pa kun tu bsten pa dang / goms par byas pa dang / lan mang du byas pas dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
translated: One who is born in hell through frequently, continuously, and perpetually committing and accumulating the taking of life?

original: de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir 'khor dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'khor dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore he says, because it is said to be together with its retinue.

original: sbyor ba ni srog gcod pa'i 'khor yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni srog gcod pa'i 'khor yin te /
translated: The taking of life is the retinue of the preparation.

original: der sbyor ba la srog gcod pa btags nas de skad ces bshad do //
analyzed: der sbyor ba la srog gcod pa btags nas de skad ces bshad do //
translated: The preparation is designated as the taking of life and it is said that one is born in hell through the taking of life.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang gnyis las mi 'da'i /
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bur bshad pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang gnyis las mi 'da'i /
translated: The result that resembles its cause is not different from the result that is a natural outcome and the result that is a conscious effort.

original: 'dra ba'i @78b khyad par las de skad bshad par zad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dra ba'i @78b khyad par las de skad bshad par zad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is merely said to be similar to those two.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba las rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par zad do //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang 'dra ba las rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no zhes bshad par zad do //
translated: The result that resembles its cause is merely said to be similar to the result that is a natural outcome and the result that is a conscious effort.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu las 'das par mi rigs shing rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la ji ltar yin mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu las 'das par mi rigs shing rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la ji ltar yin mi 'da' ste /
translated: It is not possible to transcend the dominant result, and it is not possible to transcend the result that is a natural outflow.

original: srid pa brjod pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: srid pa brjod pa'i phyir 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction because existence is mentioned.

original: dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu ni 'ga' yang rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu ni 'ga' yang rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ste /
translated: There is no result of virtuous action that does not fall into the category of the result that is a natural outflow.üîΩIf one is born in the human realm, one will have a long life.

original: de ltar yang gal te 'di nyid du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du gyur na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //üîΩgzi byin med par byas pa yin zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ltar yang gal te 'di nyid du mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du gyur na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //üîΩgzi byin med par byas pa yin zhes bya ba la /
translated: The result of the action of killing is to have a short life.

original: gzi byin ni snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa'o //
analyzed: gzi byin ni snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa'o //
translated: And splendor is in the region of the heart.

original: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The same should be applied to the other sins.

original: ma byin par len pa byed pas ni rdzas kyi bdag po la sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang / longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pa dang / gzi byin med par byas pa yin te /
analyzed: ma byin par len pa byed pas ni rdzas kyi bdag po la sdug bsngal bskyed pa dang / longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pa dang / gzi byin med par byas pa yin te /
translated: By committing theft, one causes suffering to the owner of the goods, one deprives him of his goods, and one destroys his splendor.

original: rdzas kyi dbang gis gzi byin can du 'gyur na de'i rgyu med par byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rdzas kyi dbang gis gzi byin can du 'gyur na de'i rgyu med par byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: For, by reason of his goods, he is resplendent; one destroys his cause of splendor.

original: longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgzhan gyi chung ma la nyal po byed pas ni gzhan la sdug bsngal skyed pa dang / dgra dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du byas pa dang / 'jig rten na gzi byin gang /
analyzed: longs spyod kyis phongs par byas pas de la gnod pa'i phyir ro // gzhan gyi chung ma la nyal po byed pas ni gzhan la sdug bsngal skyed pa dang / dgra dang bcas pa'i chung ma can du byas pa dang / 'jig rten na gzi byin gang /
translated: And one causes him harm by depriving him of his goods.

original: gang gis gzi dang bcas pa'o zhes nges par brjod pa'i gzi byin med par byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gzi dang bcas pa'o zhes nges par brjod pa'i gzi byin med par byas pa yin no //
translated: By committing adultery, one causes suffering to another, one makes oneself the husband of a wife who has a master, and one destroys the splendor which is recognized in the world as being the splendor of the husband.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang srid tshad du sbyar bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang srid tshad du sbyar bar bya ste /
translated: The same should be applied to the other virtues.

original: 'di ni phyogs yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni phyogs yin no //
translated: This is the rule.

original: thams cad mi dge ba las bzlog ste sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /üîΩsrog gcod pa spangs pas gzhan la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang / bsad pa dang / gzi byin med par ma byas pas de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad mi dge ba las bzlog ste sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni / srog gcod pa spangs pas gzhan la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang / bsad pa dang / gzi byin med par ma byas pas de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa gsum 'byung ngo //
translated: The opposite of nonvirtue should be applied to all.üîΩThe opposite of killing is to refrain from killing, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, not killing, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of stealing is to refrain from stealing, which has three results: not causing suffering to the owner of the stolen goods, not depriving the owner of his or her enjoyment, and not depriving the owner of his or her vitality.üîΩThe opposite of sexual misconduct is to refrain from sexual misconduct, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, not making someone else‚Äôs spouse one‚Äôs own spouse, and not depriving others of their vitality.

original: de bzhin du ma byin par len pa spangs pas rdzas kyi bdag po la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang longs spyod kyis phongs par ma byas pa dang / gzi byin med par ma byas pa de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa gsum 'byung ste /üîΩ'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pas /
analyzed: de bzhin du ma byin par len pa spangs pas rdzas kyi bdag po la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang longs spyod kyis phongs par ma byas pa dang / gzi byin med par ma byas pa de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa gsum 'byung ste / 'dod pas log par g-yem pa spangs pas /
translated: The opposite of lying is to refrain from lying, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, not deceiving others, and not depriving others of their vitality.

original: gzhan la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang / dgra bcas pa'i chung ma can du ma byas pa dang gzi byin med par @79a * //
analyzed: gzhan la sdug bsngal ma skyed pa dang / dgra bcas pa'i chung ma can du ma byas pa dang gzi byin med par @79a * //
translated: The opposite of divisive speech is to refrain from divisive speech, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, not creating disunity among others, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of harsh speech is to refrain from harsh speech, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, not causing others to regret their actions, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of idle chitchat is to refrain from idle chitchat, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, speaking at the appropriate time, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of covetousness is to refrain from covetousness, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, being satisfied with one‚Äôs own wealth, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of malice is to refrain from malice, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, being compassionate, and not depriving others of their vitality.üîΩThe opposite of wrong views is to refrain from wrong views, which has three results: not causing suffering to others, being faithful, and not depriving others of their vitality.

original: ma byas pa de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa ni gsum 'byung ste /
analyzed: ma byas pa de'i phyir de la 'bras bu rnam pa ni gsum 'byung ste /
translated: Because of not doing that, three kinds of results arise for that person.

original: gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar ro //
analyzed: gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar ro //
translated: The same should be applied to others.

original: las kyi skabs su 'di yang spyod par bya ste /
analyzed: las kyi skabs su 'di yang spyod par bya ste /
translated: This should be applied in the context of karma.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: The Bhagavat said, ‚ÄúMonks, there are two kinds of livelihood:

original: de gnyis las logs shig ston to zhes bya ba ni log par 'tsho ba ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' gnyis las so //
analyzed: de gnyis las logs shig ston to zhes bya ba ni log par 'tsho ba ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' gnyis las so //
translated: That is, it is taught separately from those two. Wrong livelihood is separate from wrong speech and wrong action.

original: de ltar bshad na chags pa las skyes pa'i lus dang ngag gi las gang dag yin pa de dag ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' yang yin la log pa'i 'tsho ba yang yin te /
analyzed: de ltar bshad na chags pa las skyes pa'i lus dang ngag gi las gang dag yin pa de dag ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' yang yin la log pa'i 'tsho ba yang yin te /
translated: If explained in this way, any karma of body and speech that arises from attachment is wrong speech, wrong action, and wrong livelihood.

original: zhe sdang dang gti mug gis kun nas bslang ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' kho na yin no //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang gti mug gis kun nas bslang ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni log pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' kho na yin no //
translated: Any that are motivated by hatred and delusion are only wrong speech and wrong action.

original: chags pa'i chos ni 'phrog par byed pa yin pas zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chags pa'i chos ni 'phrog par byed pa yin pas zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because the Dharma of attachment is that which steals.

original: chags pa'i chos ni phra mo yin pas na de 'phro bar byed pa yin no /
analyzed: chags pa'i chos ni phra mo yin pas na de 'phro bar byed pa yin no /
translated: Since the phenomena of attachment are subtle, they are difficult to eliminate.

original: shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang bsrung bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir spyad dka' pa'o ;
analyzed: shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyis kyang bsrung bar sla ba ma yin pa'i phyir spyad dka' pa'o ;
translated: Since they are not easily guarded even by the very wise, they are difficult to practice.

original: / khyim pas lta ba sbyang ba dka' ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: / khyim pas lta ba sbyang ba dka' ba ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it difficult for householders to purify their view?

original: rtag tu lta ba sna tshogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtag tu lta ba sna tshogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they always have various views.

original: ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam la sogs pa'i lta ba can yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ngo mtshar dang / bkra shis dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam la sogs pa'i lta ba can yin zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: They have views of miracles, auspiciousness, planets, stars, moments, and so on.

original: gzhan la 'tsho ba rag lus pa'i zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi lus gnas pa'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal stan la sogs pa rnams ni gzhan la rag lus pas dge slong rnams kyi 'tsho ba sbyang bar dka'o //
analyzed: gzhan la 'tsho ba rag lus pa'i zhes bya ba ni dge slong gi lus gnas pa'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal stan la sogs pa rnams ni gzhan la rag lus pas dge slong rnams kyi 'tsho ba sbyang bar dka'o //
translated: Since the robes, alms, bedding, and so on, which are the requisites for the livelihood of the body of a fully ordained monk, depend on others, it is difficult for fully ordained monks to purify their livelihood.

original: 'tsho bar bya ba ma yin pas na log pa'i 'tsho ba lnga rnams te /
analyzed: 'tsho bar bya ba ma yin pas na log pa'i 'tsho ba lnga rnams te /
translated: The five wrong livelihoods are wrong livelihoods because they are not livelihoods.

original: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag dang gzhogs slong dang thob kyis 'jal ba dang rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa rnams so //
analyzed: tshul 'chos dang kha gsag dang gzhogs slong dang thob kyis 'jal ba dang rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa rnams so //
translated: Hypocrisy, flattery, hinting, seeking gain through gain, and desire for property.

original: log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: log pa'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because they are the enjoyment of an object that is wrong.

original: ma gnang ba'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma gnang ba'i yul la yongs su longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the enjoyment of an object that is not permitted.

original: las kyi skabs su las su gtogs pa thams cad brjod par bya dgos pas de'i phyir /
analyzed: las kyi skabs su las su gtogs pa thams cad brjod par bya dgos pas de'i phyir /
translated: Since all that is included in action must be mentioned in the context of action, he says:

original: gong du 'bras bu lnga bshad pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gong du 'bras bu lnga bshad pa gang dag yin pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Those five results that were explained above.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The five results are: the result of dominance, the result of conscious effort, the result of natural out-flowing, the result of karmic maturation, and the result of freedom.

original: dri bcas spong ba'i lam dag gi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dri bcas spong ba'i lam dag gi zhes bya ba la /
translated: On the paths of abandoning that have impurities.

original: spong ba'i lam @79b ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i rnam pa gnyis yin te /
analyzed: spong ba'i lam @79b ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i rnam pa gnyis yin te /
translated: The paths of abandoning are of two types: those with impurities and those without impurities.

original: de'i phyir dri bcas zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dri bcas zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is called ‚Äúwith impurity.‚Äù

original: spong ba'i phyir lam yin pa'am zhes bya ba 'byung ste //
analyzed: spong ba'i phyir lam yin pa'am zhes bya ba 'byung ste //
translated: The path is for the purpose of abandoning.

original: spang ba ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: spang ba ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'o //
translated: Abandonment is the analytical cessation.

original: 'dis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pas na zhes bya ba ni thob pa gcod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dis nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pas na zhes bya ba ni thob pa gcod pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is called ‚Äúthe path‚Äù because it causes the abandonment of the afflictions.

original: 'dir tshig rnam par spang bas byas pa'i khyad par yod kyi don gyis byas pa ni med de gnyi gar yang bar chad med pa'i lam dang sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir tshig rnam par spang bas byas pa'i khyad par yod kyi don gyis byas pa ni med de gnyi gar yang bar chad med pa'i lam dang sbyar ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the difference is made by the exclusion of the words, not by the meaning, because both are connected with the uninterrupted path.üîΩIt is a desirable karmic maturation that belongs to its own stage.

original: rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba yin no zhes bya ba la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni bar chad med pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa'i las gang yin pa de'i sa gang yin pa der nges pa kho na'o //
analyzed: rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba yin no zhes bya ba la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni bar chad med pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa'i las gang yin pa de'i sa gang yin pa der nges pa kho na'o //
translated: The karmic maturation result is definitely in the stage of whatever contaminated action belongs to the uninterrupted path.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos 'dra ba phyi ma rnams so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos 'dra ba phyi ma rnams so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Subsequent similar qualities that arise from concentration.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir nas skyes pa rnams /
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir nas skyes pa rnams /
translated: The natural outflow result is the possession of similar qualities.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos gang dag de'i stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos gang dag de'i stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort is any phenomenon that arises through its power.üîΩAbandonment is also a result of conscious effort because it is obtained through its power.

original: spangs pa de yang yin no zhes bya ba ni de'i stobs kyis spangs pa thob pa'i phyir spangs pa yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go / gzhan dag na re spangs pa yang lam gyi bdag po'i 'bras bur rigs te de'i dbang pos deüîΩmngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: spangs pa de yang yin no zhes bya ba ni de'i stobs kyis spangs pa thob pa'i phyir spangs pa yang skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bur rnam par gzhag go / gzhan dag na re spangs pa yang lam gyi bdag po'i 'bras bur rigs te de'i dbang pos de mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: Abandonment is also the dominant result of the path because it manifests through the power of the path.üîΩThe result of conscious effort is not excluded.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bum gtogs so zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bum gtogs so zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The uncontaminated has no karmic maturation result because it has no karmic maturation.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos phyi ma rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i chos phyi ma rnams so //
translated: The natural outflow result is subsequent uncontaminated phenomena that arise from uncontaminated concentration.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu ni bral ba kho na'o //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu ni bral ba kho na'o //
translated: The result of separation is only abandonment.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni des drangs pa'i chos 'di lta ste /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni des drangs pa'i chos 'di lta ste /
translated: The human action result is the phenomenon that is drawn by that,

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa thob pa de dang spang ba de yang yin no //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam dang / de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / gang yang ma 'ongs pa thob pa de dang spang ba de yang yin no //
translated: such as the path of liberation, that which arises simultaneously with it, and also that future acquisition and abandonment.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba rnams rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba rnams rtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do //
translated: The dominant result is all conditioned states that arise later, except for the essential nature itself.

original: spong ba'i lam las gzhan pa gzhan pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa dang / sbyin pa'i sems pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang mi dge ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: spong ba'i lam las gzhan pa gzhan pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa dang / sbyin pa'i sems pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang mi dge ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: Other than the path of abandonment is any other path, which is included in the paths of preparation, liberation, and distinction, and also any virtuous or nonvirtuous action.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni /üîΩdes nyon @80a * //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni / des nyon @80a * //
translated: Except for the result of separation.

original: mongs pa spang ba ni ma yin te bar chad med pa'i lam kho na bral ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mongs pa spang ba ni ma yin te bar chad med pa'i lam kho na bral ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That is, it does not abandon afflictions, because only the uninterrupted path is connected with the result of separation.

original: de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba yin te /
translated: Its maturational result is the pleasant or unpleasant karmic maturation that belongs to its level.

original: dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir dang mi dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir dang mi dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is virtuous because it is contaminated and nonvirtuous because it is uncontaminated.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'du ba mnyam pa dang lhag pa phyi nas skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'du ba mnyam pa dang lhag pa phyi nas skyes pa rnams so //
translated: Its result that is a natural outflow is the subsequent generation of homogeneous and superior qualities.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de'i stobs kyis skyes pa gang las yin pa de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de'i stobs kyis skyes pa gang las yin pa de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa rang gi ngo bo las gzhan pa'i 'du byed thams cad do //
translated: Its human action result is whatever arises simultaneously with it or is generated by its power. Its dominant result is all conditioned states that are different from it and arose previously.

original: zag pa med pa'i lhag ma dang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba rnam par grol ba dang / khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i lhag ma dang zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba rnam par grol ba dang / khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: The remaining uncontaminated states are included in the paths of preparation, liberation, and the special path.

original: de ni bar chad med pa'i lam ma yin pa'i phyir bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med la zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de /
analyzed: de ni bar chad med pa'i lam ma yin pa'i phyir bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med la zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de /
translated: Because it is not the uninterrupted path, it also does not have the effect of separation. Because it is uncontaminated and neutral, it also does not have the effect of karmic maturation.

original: 'dir yang rgyu mthun pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag ni gong ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang rgyu mthun pa dang skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag ni gong ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the effect of natural outflow and the effect of conscious effort should be stated as above.

original: las dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba bzhin te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: las dge ba'i 'bras bu chos dge ba bzhin te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The effect of virtuous karma is like a virtuous phenomenon.

original: rigs yongs su gzung ste de skad bshad de bral ba ni dge ba thams cad kyi 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs yongs su gzung ste de skad bshad de bral ba ni dge ba thams cad kyi 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is stated in terms of the class of virtuous phenomena, because the effect of separation is not the effect of all virtuous phenomena.

original: bral ba ni rgyu ma thun pa'i 'bras bu 'am bdag po'i yang ma yin la /
analyzed: bral ba ni rgyu ma thun pa'i 'bras bu 'am bdag po'i yang ma yin la /
translated: Separation is not the effect of natural outflow or the effect of karmic maturation.

original: dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: dge ba 'dus byas rnams kyang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: Also, conditioned virtuous phenomena are not the effect of separation,

original: bral ba 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because separation is unconditioned.

original: rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Since the result of karmic maturation is neutral, it is excluded.

original: mi dge ba gnyis te /
analyzed: mi dge ba gnyis te /
translated: Two results arise from nonvirtuous actions:

original: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang gnyis so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dang gnyis so //
translated: the result of conscious effort and the dominant result.

original: de la skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: de la skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs las skyes pa'o //
translated: The result of conscious effort is that which arises from the power of nonvirtuous actions.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nyid do //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nyid do //
translated: The dominant result is all nonvirtuous phenomena that arise earlier or later.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni med de mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni med de mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The result of natural outflow does not exist because they are dissimilar.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The result of karmic maturation does not exist because they are afflicted.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The result of separation does not exist because they are conditioned and afflicted.

original: lung du ma bstan @80b pa gsum ste rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan @80b pa gsum ste rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: Three results arise from neutral actions:üîΩthe result of conscious effort, the dominant result and the result of separation are excluded.

original: 'di ltar lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni dge ba dang 'dra ba ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med la bral ba'i 'bras bu ni dge ba 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar lung du ma bstan pa rnams ni dge ba dang 'dra ba ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med la bral ba'i 'bras bu ni dge ba 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because neutral states are not similar to virtue, they do not have a natural result and their result of separation is unconditioned virtue.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ring gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni ring gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: The result of karmic maturation is the pleasant karmic maturation that is included in the distant result.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye ba 'di lta ste mjug thogs su 'byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye ba 'di lta ste mjug thogs su 'byung ba rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort is those that arise due to the power of that, such as those that arise immediately after.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa lung du ma bstan pa thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant result is all neutral states that arise earlier, excluding those already arisen.

original: las dge ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /üîΩskyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba'i chos dge ba rnams so //
analyzed: las dge ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba'i chos dge ba rnams so //
translated: The result of virtue is virtuous states,üîΩthe result of nonvirtue is nonvirtuous states,üîΩthe result of neutral states is neutral states.üîΩThe result of virtue is virtuous states,üîΩthe result of nonvirtue is nonvirtuous states,

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar skyes pa ma gtogs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar skyes pa ma gtogs pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kho na'o //
translated: the result of neutral states is neutral states.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med de mi 'dra ba'i zhing der rnam par smin pa lung du ma bstan pa yin pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med do //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu med de mi 'dra ba'i zhing der rnam par smin pa lung du ma bstan pa yin pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med do //
translated: There is no result of natural outflow because the field is dissimilar. There is also no result of karmic maturation because it is neutral.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is also no result of separation because it is conditioned.

original: mi dge ba'i ni gsum ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i ni gsum ste /
translated: The result of nonvirtue is three.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de'i mjug thogs su skyes pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de'i mjug thogs su skyes pa'o //
translated: The result of conscious effort is that which arises simultaneously with it and that which arises immediately after it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa mi dge ba thams cad do //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa mi dge ba thams cad do //
translated: The dominant result is all nonvirtuous states except for those that arise earlier.

original: sngar skyes pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni rigs mthun pa khyad par dang bcas pa rnams so //
analyzed: sngar skyes pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni rigs mthun pa khyad par dang bcas pa rnams so //
translated: The result of natural outflow of that which arises earlier is that which is similar and possesses enhancement.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'am bral ba'i 'bras bu ni med de nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir dang 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu 'am bral ba'i 'bras bu ni med de nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir dang 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no result of karmic maturation or result of separation because it is afflicted and unconditioned, respectively.

original: lung du ma bstan par ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i 'bras bu ni ma gtogs pa ste bral ba ni dge ba rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan par ni bzhi ste zhes bya ba ni bral ba'i 'bras bu ni ma gtogs pa ste bral ba ni dge ba rtag pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The result of separation is excluded because separation is a permanent virtue.

original: rnam par smin pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i phyir 'bras bu ni rang gi sar gtogs pa'i rnam par smin pa yid du mi 'ong ba'o //
translated: The result of karmic maturation is the unpleasant karmic maturation that belongs to one's level.

original: gal te chos 'dra ba rnams kho sngar skyes pa dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par bor nas /
analyzed: gal te chos 'dra ba rnams kho sngar skyes pa dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin par bor nas /
translated: If similar states are the homogeneous result of those previously arisen,üîΩhow can dissimilar neutral states be the homogeneous result of nonvirtuous states?üîΩTherefore, the root text states,

original: lung du ma bstan pa mi 'dra ba rnams mi dge ba dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar brjod ce na de'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //üîΩrgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni kun tu @81a * //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa mi 'dra ba rnams mi dge ba dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar brjod ce na de'i phyir lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so // rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni kun tu @81a * //
translated: The homogeneous result of nonvirtuous states is neutral.üîΩThe homogeneous result is established as the result of both the omnipresent cause and the similar cause.

original: 'gro ba dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dag gi yin par rnam par gzhag ste de la 'jig tshogs dang mtha' 'dzin par lta ba dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dag gi yin par rnam par gzhag ste de la 'jig tshogs dang mtha' 'dzin par lta ba dag ni lung du ma bstan pa yin du zin kyang /
translated: In this regard, the afflicted view of the self and extreme view are neutral.

original: nyon mongs pa can nyid dang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid dang 'dra ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can nyid dang sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyid dang 'dra ba'i phyir //
translated: Because they are similar to afflicted states and objects to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pas 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction in positing the pervasive cause that is an object to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering and the homogeneous cause that is an object to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering as the dominant result because they are similar to afflicted states and objects to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The result of natural outflow is not established because they are dissimilar.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni dge pa'i chos gang dag de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad do //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni dge pa'i chos gang dag de'i mjug thogs su 'byung ba de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa dge ba'i chos thams cad do //
translated: The result of conscious effort is virtuous phenomena that arise immediately after them. The dominant result is all virtuous phenomena that arise earlier.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni med de mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni med de mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The result of natural outflow does not exist because they are dissimilar.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang med de dge ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The maturational result does not exist because they are virtuous.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de 'dus ma byas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The effect of separation does not exist because they are non-compounded.

original: mi dge ba ni gsum ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni gsum ste zhes bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
translated: Nonvirtuous karma has three effects.

original: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyis rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ni yod do //
analyzed: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyis rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin pa ni yod do //
translated: Nonvirtuous karma is also the homogeneous effect of neutral states.

original: dper na chos mi dge ba ris lnga pa rnams 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba gnyis pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
analyzed: dper na chos mi dge ba ris lnga pa rnams 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba gnyis pa'i 'bras bu bcug ste'o //
translated: For example, the five types of nonvirtuous karmic paths are the effect of the two views of the transitory collection and extreme views.

original: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mi dge ba yang lung du ma bstan pa rnams kyi 'bras bu yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Nonvirtuous karma is also the effect of neutral states.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos ni gsum ste /
translated: Neutral states are three.

original: de dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba la skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / mjug thogs su 'byung ba dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: de dag kho na yin no zhes bya ba la skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba dang / mjug thogs su 'byung ba dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni sngar byung ba ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
translated: They are the same as those just explained. The effect that is an active cause is coemergent and subsequent states. The effect that is a dominant condition is all states except for those that arose in previous moments.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba phyis skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba phyis skyes pa rnams so //
translated: The effect of natural outflow is later states that are similar to the cause.

original: rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ni med de lung du ma bstan pa rnams la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu dag ni med de lung du ma bstan pa rnams la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med pa'i phyir dang nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Neither the effect of separation nor the effect of karmic maturation exist because neutral states have no effect of karmic maturation and they are not antidotes to affliction.

original: 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi'i yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi'i yin no zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: All past states are the four effects of past states.

original: 'dir rigs yongs su gzung bas de skad du bshad kyi 'das pa thams cad 'das pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir rigs yongs su gzung bas de skad du bshad kyi 'das pa thams cad 'das pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ni ma yin no //
translated: This is stated from the perspective of the type of lineage gotra, but not all past states are the four effects of all past states.

original: bral ba'i 'bras @81b bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni de 'dus ma byas yin pa nyid kyis dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras @81b bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni de 'dus ma byas yin pa nyid kyis dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The exception is the effect of separation because it is not subsumed by time since it is unconditioned.

original: las dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba 'das pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa 'das pa'o //
analyzed: las dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang / mi dge ba 'das pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa 'das pa'o //
translated: The effect of karmic maturation of past virtuous and nonvirtuous contaminated karma is past.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni 'das pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung ba de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i chos 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni 'das pa'i las dang lhan cig 'byung ba de'i stobs kyis skyes pa'i chos 'das pa rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort is past dharmas arisen by the power of that action and coexisting with it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams so //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de'i rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams so //
translated: The dominant result is past dharmas that arise later, excluding its essential nature.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dra ba phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams kho na'o //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'dra ba phyis 'byung ba 'das pa rnams kho na'o //
translated: The result that is a natural outflow is only similar past dharmas that arise later.

original: de bzhin du 'bras bu da ltar ba yang bzhi ste 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa'i da ltar ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'bras bu da ltar ba yang bzhi ste 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa'i da ltar ba'o //
translated: Similarly, the present result is fourfold. The ripened result is the present ripened result of a past action.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni sngar ma byung ba'i chos 'dra ba da ltar ba rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni sngar ma byung ba'i chos 'dra ba da ltar ba rnams so //
translated: The result that is a natural outflow is present dharmas similar to it that have not occurred previously.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos da ltar ba 'das pa'i las kyi stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni chos da ltar ba 'das pa'i las kyi stobs kyis skyes pa rnams so //
translated: The result of conscious effort is present dharmas arisen by the power of past action.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni da ltar ba thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni da ltar ba thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant result is all present dharmas.

original: ma 'ongs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod par bya ste //
translated: Future action should be explained in the same way.

original: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The ripened result of past action is the future ripened result.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: The natural result is future states similar to the action.üîΩThe dominant result is all those that arise through the power of the action.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs kyis skye bar 'gyur ba rnams so //
translated: The human action result is future states that arise immediately after the action.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant result is all future states.üîΩThe ripened result is the future ripened result.üîΩThe natural result is future states similar to the action.

original: bar ma ni ma 'ongs pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bzhi ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: bar ma ni ma 'ongs pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu bzhi ste zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The future action has four results.

original: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i mjug thogs su skye ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: The human action result is future states that arise immediately after the action.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni ma 'ongs pa thams cad kho na'o //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni ma 'ongs pa thams cad kho na'o //
translated: The dominant result is all future states.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni de'i rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The ripened result is the future ripened result.

original: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni de dang 'dra ba ma 'ongs pa rnams so //
translated: The natural result is future states similar to the action.

original: da ltar byung ba'i las kyi da ltar ba ni gnyis te skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i las kyi da ltar ba ni gnyis te skyes bu byed pa dang bdag po'i 'bras bu dag go zhes bya ba la /
translated: The present result of present action is two results: the result of conscious effort and dominant result.

original: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni lhan cig 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa yin no //
translated: The result of conscious effort of that action is that which arises simultaneously with it.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de dag gzhan dus mnyam du skyes pa yin no //üîΩda ltar ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar ba ni med de /
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni de dag gzhan dus mnyam du skyes pa yin no // da ltar ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu da ltar ba ni med de /
translated: The dominant result is that which arises at another time.

original: der rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dus snga phyir nges pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: der rgyu dang 'bras bu dag dus snga phyir nges pa'i phyir ro /
translated: The result of natural outflow and the result of karmic maturation of present action are not present because cause and result are definitely sequential.

original: @82a * // ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa gsum yin no zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: @82a * // ma skyes pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa gsum yin no zhes 'byung ste /
translated: The future result of present action is three results.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs la rag las te 'byung ba de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni gang dag de'i stobs la rag las te 'byung ba de dag go / bdag po'i 'bras bu ni rang gi ngo bo ma gtogs pa thams cad do //
translated: The result of conscious effort is that which arises in dependence on its power. The dominant result is all except its essential nature.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang mi dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ma 'ongs pa'o //
translated: The maturational result is the future karmic maturation of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions.

original: ma skyes pa rnams ni skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa med do //
analyzed: ma skyes pa rnams ni skal ba mnyam pa dang kun tu 'gro ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin pas rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa med do //
translated: Since future states do not have the same status as past and present states, they do not have homogeneous or omnipresent causes.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu yang med de dus su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They also do not have a result of separation because they do not transcend time.

original: rang gi sa pa bzhin yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhin yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The result of natural outflow is similar to that of its level.

original: 'di yang srid chad kyi dbang du byas nas bshad kyi /
analyzed: 'di yang srid chad kyi dbang du byas nas bshad kyi /
translated: This is explained from the perspective of the continuum of existence.

original: rang gi sa pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rang gi sa pa'i chos bzhi pa thams cad ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rang gi sa pa'i chos bzhi pa thams cad ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that all results of natural outflow of all levels are similar to their level.

original: zag pa med pa la yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med mod kyi /
analyzed: zag pa med pa la yang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu med mod kyi /
translated: Also, though uncontaminated states do not have a maturational result,

original: rang gis pa'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ci rigs pa las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gis pa'i chos 'dod pa na spyod pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar ci rigs pa las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: When one desires the dharma of one's own level, the four fruits of contaminated and uncontaminated karma arise from any of the levels, from the level of the desire realm up to the summit of existence.

original: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni bral ba sas ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so zhes bya ba ni bral ba sas ma bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The exception is the fruit of separation because separation is not subsumed by any level.

original: de la rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni las zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu bzhi yin la /
analyzed: de la rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni las zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'bras bu bzhi yin la /
translated: The four fruits of contaminated karma are contaminated dharmas of one's own level.

original: zag pa med pa rnams ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnams ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang bdag po'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The three fruits of uncontaminated karma are the human action fruit and dominant fruit.

original: zag pa med pa rnams ni zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu gsum yin te rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnams ni zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu gsum yin te rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: The three fruits of uncontaminated karma are the three fruits of uncontaminated karma, excluding the maturational and the fruit of separation.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa na gnyis yin te /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa na gnyis yin te /
translated: The two fruits of contaminated karma are the maturational and dominant fruits.

original: rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa dang / rgyu mthun pa dang bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs so //
translated: The two fruits of contaminated karma are the maturational and dominant fruits, excluding the natural outflow and the fruit of separation.

original: de ltar na rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams ni mdor bsdus te las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na rang gi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa rnams ni mdor bsdus te las zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'bras bu bzhir 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in brief, the contaminated and uncontaminated phenomena of one's level are the four results of contaminated and uncontaminated karma.

original: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis zhes bya ba la /üîΩzag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye bas phye nas bstan te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis zhes bya ba la / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dbye bas phye nas bstan te /
translated: Three and two of other levelsüîΩare said to be the results of contaminated karma.üîΩThe three and two of other levels are said to be the results of contaminated karma.

original: zag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zag pa med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sa pa'i gsum ste /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i las kyi 'bras bu zag pa med pa'i chos gzhan gyi sa pa'i gsum ste /
translated: The three results of uncontaminated karma are the three results of the uncontaminated phenomena of other levels,

original: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa dang / bdag po dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu rnams so //
translated: the results of conscious effort, dominant result and natural outflow.

original: @82b sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin zhes 'byung bas /
analyzed: @82b sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin zhes 'byung bas /
translated: The path of the nine levels is the homogeneous cause of each other,üîΩsince it is said that the homogeneous cause of uncontaminated phenomena is equal and superior states.

original: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas zag pa med pa'i chos mnyam pa dang / khyad par can rnams gzhan gyi sa la yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu yin pas zag pa med pa'i chos mnyam pa dang / khyad par can rnams gzhan gyi sa la yin du zin kyang /
translated: Though uncontaminated phenomena of other levels are homogeneous causes, they are not the result of uncontaminated karma.

original: gzhan gyi sa pa'i las zag pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa'i las zag pa med pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: The other-sphere karma is the result of natural outflow of uncontaminated karma.

original: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i las ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi srid do //
analyzed: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni zag pa med pa'i las ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu mi srid do //
translated: Because it does not belong to a realm, uncontaminated karma does not have the potential to be a maturational result because it does not belong to a realm.

original: bral ba yang khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sa pa nyid mi srid do //üîΩgzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni de nyid kyi gnyis yin ta /
analyzed: bral ba yang khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi sa pa nyid mi srid do // gzhan gyi sa pa'i chos zag pa dang bcas pa rnams ni de nyid kyi gnyis yin ta /
translated: Because separation does not belong to a realm, it is impossible for it to be the result of other-sphere karma.üîΩContaminated phenomena of other spheres are the two results of the active cause and dominant result of contaminated karma.
